mainEntity.name: What battery do I need for my golf cart?

acceptedAnswer.text: Cart Battery Nation offers golf cart batteries in 6V, 8V, and 12V configurations. The most popular is our 6V 225Ah system. Call 1-844-888-7732 for personalized recommendations based on your specific cart model and usage needs.

mainEntity.name: What's the difference between battery technologies?

acceptedAnswer.text: Cart Battery Nation offers four technologies: Flooded Lead-Acid (traditional, proven), AGM (maintenance-free, vibration resistant), Gel (deep cycle optimized), and Lithium (lightweight, fast charging). Each has specific advantages for different applications.

mainEntity.name: How long do Cart Battery Nation batteries last?

acceptedAnswer.text: Battery lifespan varies by technology and usage. Flooded batteries typically last 4-6 years, AGM and Gel 5-7 years, and Lithium 8-10 years with proper maintenance.
Yes, Cart Battery Nation offers professional installation services for $200. We also provide detailed installation guides and phone support during self-installation.
Core charges are refundable deposits: $29 for 6V/8V batteries, $57 for 12V batteries. You receive the refund when returning old batteries for recycling.
